mapper.sql: t.ID, t.MAC_SN, t.CMD_ID, t.MACHINE_ID, t.CULPRIT_ID, t.CHECK_TIME, t.DEAL_STATUS, t.CREATED, t.CREATER, t. UPDATED, t.UPDATER, t.DEL_FLAG
mapper.select: select ,c.name as "name", g.id as "group_id", g.name as "group_name" from SYS_IFACE_RECORD t left join sf_culprit c on c.id= t.culprit_id left join sys_group g on g.id =c.group_id where t.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_IFACE_RECORD
ID,
MAC_SN,
CMD_ID,
MACHINE_ID,
CULPRIT_ID,
CHECK_TIME,
DEAL_STATUS,
CREATED,
CREATER,
UPDATED,
UPDATER,
DEL_FLAG,

#{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update SYS_IFACE_RECORD
MAC_SN = #{macSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CMD_ID = #{cmdId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MACHINE_ID = #{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_TIME = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEAL_STATUS = #{dealStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_IFACE_RECORD set MAC_SN = #{macSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CMD_ID = #{cmdId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MACHINE_ID = #{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_TIME = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEAL_STATUS = #{dealStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select ,c.name as "name", g.id as "group_id", g.name as "group_name" from SYS_IFACE_RECORD t left join sf_culprit c on c.id= t.culprit_id left join sys_group g on g.id =c.group_id
order by ${orderStr}

sql.if: AND exists ( select t3.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) t3 where g.id=t3.id)
